item.description:
Hey everyone! Chris R and Carina Zannini will be hosting a Low-Fat, High-Fruit, substance free, Vegan Potluck at their house! We want everyone that can make it to come. Jason will be taking off work so he can make it. It will be great! There will be delicious fruits! Full Belly Fruit is hoping to have coconuts, citrus, starfruit, sapodilla, bananas just for this event :) Come on people! Lets get together and have lots of fun! We can play outside or inside, make heaps of compost, play coconut bong, and just laugh! Lets hear some fun ideas of what we can do! Anyone interested in Twister? Bring Instruments and food! We strongly advise carpooling! Contact Jason at 978-501-2067. If you are in the North Shore area, he can most likely pick you up. Also, the commuter rail runs 5 minutes from the house and stops in Westborough. Pick ups can be arranged! It will be perfect!!








(Please check calendar for more events!)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one laughing upsidedown.
item.name: Potluck: Shrewsbury
